name: Building But Better: Reloaded
description:
A mod focused on adding new building blocks with customizability and interactions!
§c§l§u§o! Pre-releases WILL be buggy ! §cPlease report any issues on our GitHub or Discord.
§9§l§uCHANGELOG (2.0pre1)§7
- Added Stone Frames and fixed Frames crashing when connecting to non-solid blocks.
- Added Balustrades
- Added Lattices
- Added native EveryCompat support.
- There's a config now !!
- Urns can now be interacted with Dirt -- when they are filled in this way, plants can be placed atop them. Use a Shovel to remove the Dirt.
